title: Deliver AIRBot MVP review pipeline
description: Track the work needed to replace the current placeholders with a functional review workflow that ingests diffs, runs Claude agents, de-duplicates findings, and emits GitHub-ready output.

title: Implement unified diff parser with fixtures
description: Replace src/parsing/unifiedDiff.ts placeholder with a parser that can ingest GitHub-style unified diffs, return structured hunks, and cover edge cases (renames, binary skips, mode changes). Add focused tests under tests/parsing/ with sample fixtures.

title: Define Claude tool registry and Bun adapters
description: Implement a typed ToolRegistry in src/tools.ts that exposes safe read-only operations (file read, repo globbing, regex search) for the Claude Agent SDK. Include validation of input paths, limit execution scope, and add unit tests or stubs demonstrating expected interactions.

title: Author reviewer agent prompts and skill docs
description: Fill in src/agents.ts with production-ready prompts, model choices, and tool selections for style, security, and test reviewers. Update CLAUDE.md and the SKILL.md files under .claude/skills/ with concrete guidance the agents can reference.

title: Implement finding de-duplication heuristics
description: Replace the no-op dedupeFindings in src/dedupe.ts with logic that merges overlapping comments, respects GitHub review constraints, and prefers higher-severity findings. Add unit coverage verifying duplicates are merged while distinct comments remain.

title: Wire runReview orchestration and CLI integration
description: Implement runReview in src/index.ts to gather repo metadata, invoke the agent roster, collect findings, run dedupe, and format GitHub review output. Update the review script and .github/workflows/airbot.yml to execute the built CLI instead of echo placeholders.

title: Integrate Claude Agent runtime
description: Replace the placeholder AgentRuntime with real Claude Agent SDK orchestration, including prompt wiring and tool invocation. Add tests verifying runtime error handling and finding collection.

title: Test GitHub client helper
description: Add unit tests for the GitHubClient wrapper to confirm diff/pull/file fetch behavior and review submission handling using mocked Octokit responses.
